alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Fremont; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 02 at 5:46PM MDT until July 02 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL FREMONT, SOUTHERN EL PASO AND NORTHWESTERN PUEBLO COUNTIES... At 546 PM MDT, Thunderstorms producing heavy rain continue across the warned area. The public has reported flooding on Interstate 25 near Pinon, with the roads nearly impossible. Additional flooding near the Pinon area, with the intersection of Bat Masterson Lane and Blackstone under water. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pueblo, Florence, Pueblo West, Penrose, Pinon and Canon City. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
